div.p: Well I’m one of three so there’s me and I’ve got two brothers so I’m the only girl so I get really spoilt!
My mum and dad, my mum works for the support team, she really enjoys her job, she loves working with the young people
and you know supporting them. My dad works for a construction company, my dad wasn’t so keen on me becoming
a dancer or you know going along the performing arts route as he would tell me to get a proper job so he was quite happy
when I was in an admin role, you know an office job 9am-5pm whereas my mum would support me whatever I wanted to do
and I think also they’ve taught me that to get where you want to get in life you do have to work hard and put your all into it,
